promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, short, single-word name for a massive rare bison fire-type pokemon wearing white armor. It can be found in desert-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon, fire or bison. Ony answer with the generated name
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Aridhorn, a a massive rare bison fire-type pokemon. It can be found in desert-like environments It has the following abilities: Attack Operation. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the words "bison", "fire" or "Aridhorn". Use a maximum of 150 characters. Only answer with the generated description.
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of fire-type pokemon, bison-like, rare, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, lava texture background
generatedDescription: Aridhorn, the blazing behemoth of the desert, uses its scorching horns to carve through terrain searching for food. Its Attack Operation: sizzling surprise!
